description.narrative: Lack of a national budget for 2020, a dissolved Parliament and the COVID-19 crisis had a significant impact on implementation in this area. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:25/08/2020

target.value: 2022:1.6 per cent of GDP maintained or increased

actual.value: 2020:No approved National Budget for 2020. Will report at year end.
